articles.title: Wildfires race across Chile, leaving 18 dead and forcing thousands to flee - AP News
articles.description: Authorities in Chile say that wildfires raging across central and southern areas of the country have left at least 18 people dead. The flames have scorched thousands of acres of forest and destroyed scores of homes. The South American country is sweltering un…
articles.content: PENCO, Chile (AP) Wildfires raging across central and southern Chile on Sunday left at least 18 people dead, scorched thousands of acres of forest and destroyed hundreds of homes, authorities said, a… [+3465 chars]

articles.title: European Union and Mercosur bloc sign landmark free trade agreement - PBS

articles.title: Trump’s crusade against Big Tech’s energy spending highlights a problem with no easy answers - MarketWatch
articles.description: ‘It’s not something that can be solved overnight’: AI has overwhelmed the electricity grid, and everyone from average Americans to Trump is outraged
